The prediction also seems to be hallucinating some regions outside the actual AEROPLANE shape.
content.15: The prediction mask of the PERSON region is quite fragmented and incomplete. It misses a significant portion of the ground truth PERSON, particularly towards the lower part of the figure. The boundaries are also quite irregular and noisy.

content.18: The prediction mask of the SOFA class is quite fragmented and incomplete compared to the ground truth. Large portions of the SOFA region are missed, particularly on the right side and the back of the sofa. The boundaries are also quite irregular and less defined in the prediction mask.

content.11: The prediction mask largely captures the DININGTABLE region, however, the boundaries are quite rough and imprecise. There's noticeable leakage into the areas occupied by the people, and the segmentation is not consistently applied across the entire table surface.
content.15: The prediction mask of the PERSON region is quite accurate overall, capturing most of the ground truth. However, the boundaries of the PERSON regions are not well-defined, especially around the hands and shoulders. There's some over-extension of the prediction mask into the TABLE region below.

content.7: The prediction mask of the CAR region is quite fragmented and incomplete. It misses significant portions of the CAR body, particularly around the window and the side panel. The prediction also hallucinates some CAR regions in the background, where there is no CAR in the ground truth.
content.15: The prediction mask of the PERSON region is quite fragmented and incomplete. Large portions of the ground truth PERSON are missed, especially around the head and shoulders. The prediction also extends into areas outside the ground truth PERSON, creating spurious regions.

content.12: The prediction mask of the DOG region is quite rough and incomplete. It misses a significant portion of the ground truth DOG, particularly around the head and the lower part of the body. The boundary of the predicted DOG is also quite jagged and irregular compared to the smoother boundary in the ground truth.
content.17: The prediction mask of the SHEEP region is quite fragmented and incomplete. Large portions of the ground truth SHEEP have been missed, particularly around the head and along the body. The prediction seems to be hallucinating small, isolated segments of the SHEEP class, rather than capturing the contiguous shape present in the ground truth.
